alert.note: Alert for Kohala (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued December 09 at 3:25AM HST until December 09 at 6:00PM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING FOR LEEWARD KOHALA UNTIL 6 PM HST THIS EVENING... ...WIND ADVISORY FOR PORTIONS OF HAWAII AND MAUI COUNTIES UNTIL 6 AM HST SATURDAY... .Trade winds will be especially strong today with wind speeds slowly decreasing on Saturday. The strongest winds will occur over and downwind of terrain, and in saddle areas between mountains. ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM HST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...East winds 25 to 40 mph with localized gusts over 60 mph. * WHERE...Kohala area of the Big Island. * WHEN...Until 6 PM HST this evening. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds may blow down trees and power lines and damage roofs. Power outages are possible. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Strong winds may lead to property damage. Hazardous driving conditions due to powerful cross winds will pose a serious risk for drivers, especially for light weight and high profile vehicles. Loose outdoor items should be brought inside or secured properly.
